# Host Checklist (Fillable)

Episode Title: _______________________
Recording Date/Time: __________________
Guest(s): _____________________________

## Pre-Show Prep
- [ ] Review run-of-show and talking points.
- [ ] Review guest bio and pronunciation notes.
- [ ] Review sponsor reads and disclosures.
- [ ] Confirm intro/outro CTA.
- [ ] Confirm any sensitive topics to avoid.

## Live Reads & Plugs
- [ ] Sponsor read copy printed or on tablet.
- [ ] Guest plugs queued (links, dates, handles).
- [ ] Host plugs confirmed (tour dates, merch, newsletter).

## On-Air Notes
- [ ] Open with intro and guest welcome.
- [ ] Confirm sponsor read timing.
- [ ] Ask for guest plugs near outro.
- [ ] Close with CTA and next episode tease.

## Post-Show
- [ ] Confirm any corrections needed.
- [ ] Share any follow-up links or clarifications.
